name: The Cannon Fighters
description:
The Cannon Fighters is an action game with fully destructible environments. Experience loads of fun alone or with friends!
Randomly generated levels in various environments await you for even greater entertainment. Gain experience and show that you belong among the best!

Fully destructible environments
Enjoy a lot of fun in a fully destructible environment that is generated before each game. During intense battles, debris flies everywhere. You can strategize and carve your own path. Completely shattered levels are not a rarity!



Game balancing
The game is balanced in such a way that it is possible to defeat opponents with any tank and armament. Everything depends on your skill.



Traps for enemies
You can surprise your opponent by breaking crates with grenades within their reach. After the explosion, the grenades scatter around and destroy everything in their vicinity, including the environment.



Purchasing equipment for in-game achievements
Thanks to your achievements in the game, you can purchase better weaponry after each round. The reward is calculated based on the damage inflicted, not just on enemy destruction. Each weapon differs in parameters such as damage, explosion radius, and reload time. Heavier and larger tanks have higher durability but lower speed.
